itunes:subtitle: Monkeypox is the hot new disease for 2022 but for some reason no one can figure out it’s mostly affecting gay guys, ‘Top Gun 2’ looks incredible even though the plot is preposterous, and Dan spent his entire weekend eating Mexican Pizzas from Taco Bell. ...
itunes:summary:
Monkeypox is the hot new disease for 2022 but for some reason no one can figure out it’s mostly affecting gay guys, ‘Top Gun 2’ looks incredible even though the plot is preposterous, and Dan spent his entire weekend eating Mexican Pizzas from Taco Bell.
